-----Original Message-----
From: MuramasaIII@... [mailto:MuramasaIII@...]
Sent: Tuesday, December 21, 2004 2:09 PM
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [nihontostudy] Musashi's sword , WARNING, NOT sword related AT ALL,
A JOKE



I can't help myself on this...........by your logic..............

right handed persons use left hand to clean themselves after the bowel
movement..... that is the very efficient hand, yes ?
While left handed persons use their right hand for the same chore, ummmmmm,
not so efficient.

I do hope you shake hands with your right.

Milt

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Musashi's sword , WARNING, NOT sword related AT ALL, A JOKE
messages.msgSnippet: Actually (and this is for the guys) a normal activity you do by yourself right handed is really neat to do left handed since it feels like someone is doing it
messages.messageBody:
Actually (and this is for the guys) a normal activity
you do by yourself right handed is really neat to do
left handed since it feels like someone is doing it
for you..........bob elder (dang near ambidextous)
